2541.verse: فَجَعَلَهُمْ|So he made them|136|146|11831$جُذَٲذًا|(into) pieces|104|125|11832$إِلَّا|except|65|86|86$كَبِيرًا|a large (one)|106|127|2548$لَّهُمْ|of them,|76|97|98$لَعَلَّهُمْ|so that they may|135|145|1621$إِلَيْهِ|to it|54|312|296$يَرْجِعُونَ|return.|105|363|3002$

2543.verse: قَالُواْ|They said,|89|101|101$سَمِعْنَا|"We heard|88|113|882$فَتًى|a youth|71|96|11834$يَذْكُرُهُمْ|mention them|110|135|11835$يُقَالُ لَهُۥٓ|he is called|102|127|11836$إِبْرَٲهِيمُ|Ibrahim."|91|103|1152$

2544.verse: قَالُواْ|They said,|89|96|101$فَأْتُواْ|"Then bring|95|108|219$بِهِۦ|him|52|66|204$عَلَىٰٓ|before|63|76|52$أَعْيُنِ|(the) eyes|90|104|11837$ٱلنَّاسِ|(of) the people|120|134|75$لَعَلَّهُمْ|so that they may|135|142|1621$يَشْهَدُونَ|bear witness."|114|114|4659$

2549.verse: قَالَ|He said,|73|81|309$أَفَتَعْبُدُونَ|"Then do you worship|163|179|11844$مِن دُونِ|besides|101|117|224$ٱللَّهِ|Allah|53|69|2$مَا|what|53|69|262$لَا|(does) not|90|106|30$يَنفَعُكُمْ|benefit you|95|103|8457$شَيْــًٔا|(in) anything|105|206|472$وَلَا|and not|71|273|25$يَضُرُّكُمْ|harms you?|95|196|3224$

2550.verse: أُفٍّ|Uff|52|64|10307$لَّكُمْ|to you|63|88|207$وَلِمَا|and to what|101|126|11845$تَعْبُدُونَ|you worship|99|124|1216$مِن دُونِ|besides|101|126|224$ٱللَّهِ‌ۖ|Allah.|56|81|2$أَفَلَا|Then will not|105|117|452$تَعْقِلُونَ|you use reason?"|133|133|453$

2553.verse: وَأَرَادُواْ|And they intended|142|155|11852$بِهِۦ|for him,|70|96|204$كَيْدًا|a plan|60|86|8808$فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُمُ|but We made them|146|172|11853$ٱلْأَخْسَرِينَ|the greatest losers.|151|164|11854$

2554.verse: وَنَجَّيْنَـٰهُ|And We delivered him|162|169|11855$وَلُوطًا|and Lut|81|95|5798$إِلَى|to|53|67|118$ٱلْأَرْضِ|the land|92|106|100$ٱلَّتِى|which|61|75|232$بَـٰرَكْنَا|We (had) blessed|136|150|6771$فِيهَا|[in it]|57|64|253$لِلْعَـٰلَمِينَ|for the worlds.|117|117|3107$

2541.verse: So he made them into fragments, except a large one among them, that they might return to it [and question].

2542.verse: They said, "Who has done this to our gods? Indeed, he is of the wrongdoers."

2543.verse: They said, "We heard a young man mention them who is called Abraham."

2544.verse: They said, "Then bring him before the eyes of the people that they may testify."

2545.verse: They said, "Have you done this to our gods, O Abraham?"

2546.verse: He said, "Rather, this - the largest of them - did it, so ask them, if they should [be able to] speak."

2547.verse: So they returned to [blaming] themselves and said [to each other], "Indeed, you are the wrongdoers."

2548.verse: Then they reversed themselves, [saying], "You have already known that these do not speak!"

2549.verse: He said, "Then do you worship instead of Allah that which does not benefit you at all or harm you?

2550.verse: Uff to you and to what you worship instead of Allah. Then will you not use reason?"

2551.verse: They said, "Burn him and support your gods - if you are to act."

2552.verse: Allah said, "O fire, be coolness and safety upon Abraham."

2553.verse: And they intended for him harm, but We made them the greatest losers.

2554.verse: And We delivered him and Lot to the land which We had blessed for the worlds.

2555.verse: And We gave him Isaac and Jacob in addition, and all [of them] We made righteous.
